OK y'all, tomorrow it will have been 4 weeks since my mum died. In some ways I feel like I am behind and sucking, but I have completed or mostly completed 3 big jobs: purging the kitchen, purging mum's clothes, and going through most of mum's most personal effects.
I'm doing such a good job.
